summary: I HAVE HAD TO HAVE THE DEALER REPLACE/MACHINE THE FRONT ROTORS EVERY 8 - 10,000 MILES SINCE I PURCHASED THE THE VEHICLE NEW. THEY HAVE GIVEN ME ALL KINDS OF EXCUSSES FROM WARE AND TEAR TO DRIVING INRAIN CAUSE THE ROTOR TO WARP WHEN THEY ARE HOT AND HIT WATER.  I THINK  IT THE CALIPER THAT ARE PROBLEM AND NOT THE PAD OR ROTOR.
